section.title: Example: Appending data to a List Control
section.description: The example below shows how to append data to a List Control in a UX Component. The data to append is defined as a JSON array.
section.important: The *[js:.appendRows()]* method does not flag the rows as "new" when added to an updatable List Control and are subsequently not synchronized to the server. If you are appending rows to an updatable List, use the [addTableRow()] or [addTableRowsBulk()] method instead.
